TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataTemplateKey extends System.Windows.TemplateKey

Docs.summary: Represents the resource key for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate"> class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplateKey"> class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When constructed without a data type, you must specify `DataType` as a property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(object dataType) cil managed

Docs.param: The type for which this template is designed. This is either a <see cref="T:System.Type"> (to indicate that the <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> is used to display items of the given type), or a string (to indicate that the <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> is used to display <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> elements with the given tag name).
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplateKey"> class with the specified type.
